properties.entry: INSERT INTO SH_INFO ( SH_NO , SH_TITLE , SH_TYPE , SH_STR , SH_AREA , SH_FLOOR , SH_INTRO , SH_PERS , SH_COMS , SH_SS , SH_ADDRESS , SH_LA , SH_LO , SH_BANK , SH_MART , SH_PARMACY , SH_SUBWAY , SH_CAFE , SH_STORE , SH_STATUS , SH_DATE , PAY_NO ) VALUES ( 'SH' || SH.nextval , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , SYSDATE , 'PY4' )

INSERT INTO SH_PHOTO ( SH_I , SH_INAME , SH_IPATH , SH_NO , SH_ITYPE , SH_CHNAME
)VALUES( 'SHIMG' || SHIMG.nextval , ? , ? , 'SH' || SH.CURRVAL , ? , ? )

INSERT INTO SH_ROOM ( SH_RNO , SH_RIMG , SH_RTYPE , SH_GENDER , SH_RAREA , SH_DEPOSIT , SH_ADMCOST , SH_MONTHLY , SH_RDATE , SH_CAPACITY , SH_RNAME , SH_RIMGPATH , SH_NO , SH_RCHIMG ) VALUES ( 'ROOM' || ROOM.nextval , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'SH' || SH.CURRVAL , ? )
INSERT INTO SH_REPORT ( SH_REPORTNUM , SH_REPORT_REASON , SH_CONTENT , SH_REPORT_DATE , SH_NO , HST_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , ? , ? )
